import React from 'react'; import { ScrollPage, Animator, batch, Fade, Sticky, FadeIn, MoveIn, MoveOut, StickyIn, ZoomIn } from 'react-scroll-motion' import myImg from '../../img/m.jpeg' import { TiSocialLinkedin } from 'react-icons/ti' import { FiMail, FiGithub } from 'react-icons/fi' import './index.css' const Contact =()=>{ const handleContactClick = (url) =>{ const win = window.open(url, '_blank') win.focus() } const ZoomInScrollOut = batch(StickyIn(), FadeIn(), ZoomIn()) return ( <>
contact
{/* linkedin link */}
handleContactClick('https://www.linkedin.com/in/lina-ova/')}>

Polina Nazarova

 {/* github link */}
handleContactClick('https://github.com/lina-ova')}>

lina-ova

 {/* mail */}
handleContactClick('mailto:polina.w.nazarova@helsinki.fi')}>

polina.w.nazarova@helsinki.fi
) } export default Contact;
